getLog.sql: SELECT l.id, u.kasutaja AS kasutaja, $2 AS user_id, ''::VARCHAR(20) AS koostatud, ''::VARCHAR(20) AS muudatud, (case when (coalesce((l.propertis->>'event'),'no') = 'print') then to_char(l.timestamp, 'DD.MM.YYYY HH.MM.SS') else '' end)::VARCHAR(20) as prinditud, (case when (coalesce((l.propertis->>'event'),'no') = 'email') then to_char(l.timestamp, 'DD.MM.YYYY HH.MM.SS') else '' end)::VARCHAR(20) as email, 'Status:' || (l.propertis->>'status')::text as muud FROM ou.logs l INNER JOIN ou.userid u ON l.user_id = u.id WHERE coalesce((l.propertis ->> 'isik_id')::INTEGER, 0) = $1::INTEGER AND l.rekvid = u.rekvid
